new life new site

Complicating, circulating…new site, new site.

Operating, generating…new site, new site.

Thanks for coming by, and for indulging my Depeche Mode reference.1 It’s decidedly in an early state of becoming, as I figure out how to use Jekyll and this particular theme.

I’ll probably be using this for more long-form writing and keep the shorter things over at my Tumblr site, Not Evenly Distributed. The Tumblarians over there are a good bunch, sociable, generous, witty, and insightful. Why not check them out for yourself?

  1. Clicking the title of this post should take you to YouTube, to help you know the song if you’re not already humming along. ↩
